text:
Meet the Vega Architects at IBM Insight 2015
Vega to host a Solution Suite at IBM Insight 2015 for attendees to meet individually with Vega Architects to discuss business and technology issues.
Irvine, CA, August 26, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Vega ECM Solutions, the leader in implementing IBM ECM and Case Management solutions for complex business scenarios will be an exhibitor and sponsor at the IBM Insight 2015 conference. The event will run from October 25th through 29th at the Mandalay Bay Conference Center in Las Vegas, NV.
Vega will be demonstrating their new solutions for Government and Insurance as well as their award winning Vega Unity Products. In addition to demonstrations on the exhibition floor, Vega will be hosting a Solution Suite in the Mandalay Bay, offering attendees an opportunity to meet one on one with Vega architects who specialize in solving complex business challenges using IBM Case Manager and ECM products. The Vega architects will be available to review the new Vega Government and Insurance Solutions, or to discuss specific challenges and issues that attendees face. The Suite can be reserved by attendees for one on one meetings prior to the conference or directly with the Vega team on the exhibition floor.
“We think this is a ground breaking opportunity for attendees to meet with the architects that help make customers successful with these products and technologies,” commented Brian Schlosser, Vega CEO. “By helping attendees understand how to solve their complex business challenges in a one-on-one setting with the actual practitioners, offers a new value dimension to the conference.”
Vega will also be co-presenting with a number of customers at IBM Insight 2015. Presentations currently scheduled include the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission, ACE Insurance Group, and the LDS Church. Each of these presentations will spotlight the value and benefits realized from their solutions which utilize IBM ECM and Case Manager and Vega Unity products.
You can register for IBM Insight 2015 at http://www-01.ibm.com/software/events/insight/. You can register for a one on one session to meet the architects in the Vega Solution Suite by sending an email to: insightsuitereservation@vegaecm.com or by visiting the Vega Website at http://www.vegaecm.com/vega-solution-suite-at-ibm-insight-2015/
About Vega ECM Solutions
Vega ECM Solutions is a global company with a mission to provide Adaptive Case Management solutions which solve complex business issues. Vega solutions aggregate information from multiple systems, and provide that information, in context through a single user interface. Vega ECM Solutions is based in Irvine, California. www.vegaecm.com
